item.title: Simple-Gin
item.author: serialt
item.description: Simple Gin package main import ( "fmt" "log/slog" "net/http" "time" "github.com/gin-gonic/gin" "github.com/prometheus/client_golang/prometheus" "github.com/prometheus/client_golang/prometheus/promhttp" ) type msg struct { Count int64 `json:"count"` } var pingCounter = prometheus.NewCounter( prometheus.CounterOpts{ Name: "ping_request_count", Help: "No of request handled by Ping handler", }, ) var httpReqs = prometheus.NewCounterVec( prometheus.CounterOpts{ Name: "http_requests_total", Help: "How many HTTP requests processed, partitioned by status code and HTTP method.", }, []string{"code", "method"}, ) func PromHandler(handler http.Handler) gin.HandlerFunc { return func(c
